coffee-pub-cartographer.headingH1GettingStarted-Hint: This is the getting started section of the module.
coffee-pub-cartographer.headingH4Introduction-Hint: This is the introduction section of the module.
coffee-pub-cartographer.headingH2CommonSettings-Hint: This is the common settings section of the module.
coffee-pub-cartographer.headingH3DrawingToolSettings-Hint: Configure settings for the temporary drawing tool.
coffee-pub-cartographer.drawing.enablePlayerDrawing-Hint: Allow players to draw temporarily on the canvas for planning purposes.
coffee-pub-cartographer.drawing.timedEraseTimeout-Hint: Time before drawings auto-delete when timed erase is enabled. Range: 5-120 seconds.
coffee-pub-cartographer.drawing.hotkeyEnabled-Hint: Allows the configured hotkey to activate the Drawing Tool. The Hotkey is set in the core FoundryVTT settings. (Defualt: L)
coffee-pub-cartographer.drawing.hotkeyMode-Hint: Hold means active only while pressed. Toggle means press once to enable/disable.
coffee-pub-cartographer.drawing.blockWhenTyping-Hint: Prevents the hotkey from firing when chat or form fields have focus.
coffee-pub-cartographer.toolbar.height-Hint: Height of the Cartographer toolbar in pixels. Range: 15-100 pixels.
